title: Woman's Evolution: From Matriarchal Clan to Patriarchal Family
description: "Certain to become a classic text in women's history."-Publishers Weekly "A landmark book."-Kate Millet"An impressive and absorbing reconstruction of human history."-Sociology"This is a fascinating and scholarly book, useful in sociology and anthropology courses and to any woman needing encouragement about the contributions of her sex to history."AAAS Books and News (American Association for the Advancement of Science)"An instant classic. The definitive work on evolutionary theory as it relates to women."-Women's Guide to Books
author: Evelyn Reed
